#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
void bin(long long int number,long long int count)
{
	long long int i=1,j=1,t=0,s=1,k=0;
	while(number)
	{
		
	//	printf("a%lld\n",number);
		if(number&1)
		{
			
			s=count/j;
			if(s%2==0)
			{
				//printf("b%lld lld\n",count,j);
			t+=(long long int)pow(2,k);
			//printf("%lld\n",t);
			}
			j=j*2;
			
		}
		number=number>>1;
		k++;
	}
	printf("%lld",t);
	printf("\n");
}
	
int main()
{
	int testcases;
	long long int number,temporary,count;
	scanf("%d", &testcases);
	
	while(testcases--) {
		scanf("%lld%lld", &number, &count);
		bin(number,count);
		//printf("%lld\n",number>>1);
	}
	return 0;
}
